issue.title: gazebo6 always crashes when adding a ROS camera plugin (libgazebo_ros_camera.so)

content.raw:
The Debian `ros-indigigo-gazeboX-ros-control` (with X =4,5,6) packages started crashing for me in May this year, see [associated gazebo_ros_pkgs github issue 341](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/issues/341). As noted there, installing gazebo_ros_pkgs from source and compiling seems to be a relatively robust approach for keeping things working.

To reduce the likelihood of this popping up again, there should probably be some SOP that makes sure the dependent ROS packages are re-built/released on Gazebo ABI change.
